sn15.12:1.2: “Mendicants, this transmigration has no known beginning. …
sn15.12:1.3: When you see someone in a good way, in a happy state, you should conclude:
sn15.12:1.4: ‘In all this long time, we too have undergone the same thing.’
sn15.12:1.6: This transmigration has no known beginning. …
sn15.12:1.8: This is quite enough for you to become disillusioned, dispassionate, and freed regarding all conditions.”
